org.apache.sysds.runtime.compress.colgroup

Class ColGroupValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.sysds.runtime.compress.colgroup.ColGroup
      • org.apache.sysds.runtime.compress.colgroup.ColGroupValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ColGroupDDC, ColGroupOffset

    public abstract class ColGroupValue
extends ColGroup
    Base class for column groups encoded with value dictionary. This include column groups such as DDC OLE and RLE.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.sysds.runtime.compress.colgroup.ColGroup

      • getNumValues

        public int getNumValues()
        Obtain number of distinct sets of values associated with the bitmaps in this column group.
        Returns:

      • getValues

        public double[] getValues()
        Description copied from class: ColGroup
        Get all the values in the colGroup. Note that this is only the stored values not the way they are stored. Making the output a list of values used in that colGroup not the actual full column.
        Specified by:
        getValues in class ColGroup
        Returns:
        a double list of values.

      • getByteValues

        public byte[] getByteValues()

      • getValuesAsBlock

        public MatrixBlock getValuesAsBlock()
        Description copied from class: ColGroup
        Returns the ColGroup as a MatrixBlock. Used as a fall back solution in case a operation is not supported. Use in connection to getIfCountsType to get if the values are repeated.
        Specified by:
        getValuesAsBlock in class ColGroup
        Returns:
        Matrix Block of the contained Values. Possibly contained in groups.

      • getCounts

        public final int[] getCounts()
        Returns the counts of values inside the MatrixBlock returned in getValuesAsBlock Throws an exception if the getIfCountsType is false. The returned counts always contains the number of zeros as well if there are some contained, even if they are not materialized.
        Returns:
        the count of each value in the MatrixBlock.

      • getCounts

        public final int[] getCounts(int rl,
                             int ru)
        Returns the counts of values inside the MatrixBlock returned in getValuesAsBlock Throws an exception if the getIfCountsType is false. The returned counts always contains the number of zeros as well if there are some contained, even if they are not materialized.
        Parameters:
        rl - the lower index of the interval of rows queried
        ru - the the upper boundary of the interval of rows queried
        Returns:
        the count of each value in the MatrixBlock.

      • getIfCountsType

        public boolean getIfCountsType()
        Description copied from class: ColGroup
        Returns true if in the getValuesAsBlock method returns values in groups (that needs to be counted) or individually potentially repeated values
        Specified by:
        getIfCountsType in class ColGroup
        Returns:
        boolean

      • unaryAggregateOperations

        public void unaryAggregateOperations(AggregateUnaryOperator op,
                                     double[] c)
        Description copied from class: ColGroup
        Unary Aggregate operator, since aggregate operators require new object output, the output becomes an uncompressed matrix.
        Specified by:
        unaryAggregateOperations in class ColGroup
        Parameters:
        op - The operator used
        c - Rhe output matrix block.

      • unaryAggregateOperations

        public void unaryAggregateOperations(AggregateUnaryOperator op,
                                     double[] c,
                                     int rl,
                                     int ru)
        Description copied from class: ColGroup
        Unary Aggregate operator, since aggregate operators require new object output, the output becomes an uncompressed matrix.
        Specified by:
        unaryAggregateOperations in class ColGroup
        Parameters:
        op - The operator used
        c - The output matrix block.
        rl - The Starting Row to do aggregation from
        ru - The last Row to do aggregation to (not included)
